alert.note: Alert for North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 12:28PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Louis County through 100 PM CDT... At 1227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ash Lake, or 29 miles southeast of International Falls, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ash Lake around 1235 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pelican Lake, Cusson and Orr. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
